newsitem.title: USA: Alliant Techsystems may post Q4 gain.
newsitem.headline: Alliant Techsystems may post Q4 gain.

text.p: Alliant Techsystems Inc said Friday it expects to record an after-tax gain of about $20 million from the sale of its Marine Systems Group if the deal closes by the end of the March 31 fourth quarter as anticipated.
The sale, to Hughes Electronics Corp for about $141 million in cash, is subject to regulatory approval.

"About $90 million of the cash generated from the sale will go toward reducing our debt, which will strengthen our balance sheet and give us the financial flexibility to continue to participate in the consolidation of the defense industry," said president Richard Schwartz in a statement.

He added, "The debt repayment will lower our debt to total capitalization ratio significantly from the current level of 65 percent and reduce our interest expense accordingly. The balance will be used for our share repurchase program or other strategic initiatives."

Earlier Friday the aerospace and defense company reported third-quarter earnings from continuing operations of $1.20 a share, excluding an $0.08 a share gain from discontinued operations. Sales gained to $300.8 million from $257.1 million.
